meanings.definition: Photodissociates: to break apart or separate into smaller parts when exposed to light.
meanings.sent1: When the sun shines on the compound, it photodissociates into its individual elements.
meanings.sent2: Plants use sunlight to photodissociate water into oxygen and hydrogen.
meanings.sent3: The light was so bright that it caused the Lego structure to photodissociate into scattered pieces.
meanings.sent4: Her smile seemed to photodissociate the tension in the room, bringing a sense of calm.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brushstrokes photodissociate the canvas, creating a beautiful masterpiece of colors and shapes.
